config.label: Items
config.name: items
config.helpText: Elements of the slider. You can add as many as you want.

arrayContent.label: URL Image
arrayContent.name: src
arrayContent.helpText: URL of the image to show at the top of the card. If it is not filled it will not be displayed.

arrayContent.label: Alternative Text
arrayContent.name: alt
arrayContent.helpText: Alternative text of the image to be displayed if the image is not loaded.

arrayContent.label: Long Description
arrayContent.name: longdesc
arrayContent.helpText: Long description of the image if the alternative text cannot accommodate this text because it is very long

arrayContent.label: Link
arrayContent.name: href
arrayContent.helpText: If you fill it, clicking on the slide will redirect to the indicated url.

arrayContent.label: Image Target
arrayContent.name: target
arrayContent.helpText: Link opening mode. It can be _blank, _self, _parent, _top

arrayContent.label: Responsive SRC
arrayContent.name: responsiveSRC
arrayContent.helpText: URL of the image to display for mobile devices. If you leave it blank, the same image will be displayed for any type of screen.
